item.title: Legendary Jobs!
item.description: Woke up today (actually yesterday as its past 12 midnight) to hear the news of Steve Jobs’ death. The news about the death of a man whom I consider one of my role models actually left a kind of pain. Yup, I felt sad, as if someone I knew had died :( â€Ž3 apples changed the world, 1st one seduced eve,2nd fell on newton and the 3rd was offered to the world half bitten by
